reviews.snippet: This place was a few doors away from our hotel and was a really pleasant experience! Excellent Wagyu entrees and the Yakiniku really added to the enjoyment of our party. We were seated in a private booth and had exceptional service from everyone we met at the restaurant. Highly recommended! @tsukiji, @Ginza @yakiniku @Japanese bbq @wagyu @halal

response.snippet:
Hi, Rachael Bamgboye!
Thank you so much for recommending Wagyu Japanese BBQ Yakiniku (Halal) & Hamburger Ramen Tsukiji Ginza Restaurant Zen! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our signature Wagyu burger so close to Tsukiji Ginza. Our team works hard to deliver not only authentic Japanese BBQ and Yakiniku, but also Halal-friendly dishes so that all guests can enjoy with peace of mind. Knowing that you found it “absolutely delicious” and worth recommending means the world to us. We truly hope every visitor leaves satisfied, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for more Wagyu and Japanese BBQ!

reviews.snippet: Great spot in OTsukiji, close to Ginza! I went to @Yakiniku for some Japanese BBQ and it did not disappoint. The Wagyu was top quality and melted in the mouth. They also have (Halal) options which is a big plus. Super convenient location, just near the tsuki market, so it was easy to get to. Definitely a place I’d go back to!
